description: This theater lab involves the student in the conceptual and practical processes of stage performance. Class sessions include practical problem-solving and hands-on experiences for productions which are part of the St. Olaf theater season. Experiences in scenery, props, costumes, lighting, sound, and stage management are available. P/N only. First-year students are encouraged to enroll. May be repeated. Registration is by audition or interview only. The theater lab 253A: Design, Technical Production is offered each semester. Also counts toward musical theater concentration.
name: Theater Lab: Design/Tech Prod
notes: Quarter-credit labs include practical problem-solving and hands-on experiences
for productions which are part of the St. Olaf theater season, and students
enroll in labs solely via permission of the instructor.
title: Theater Lab: Design, Technical Production
